front.title: The RFCXML version 3 Vocabulary as Implemented

abstract.t: This document describes the RFCXML version 3 vocabulary as implemented in tools used by the RFC Production Center at the time of publication. Editorial Note This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this draft takes place on the rswg@rfc-editor.org mailing list, which has its home page at <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/rswg>. Source code and issues list for this draft can be found at <https://github.com/jrlevine/draft-rswg-xml2rfcv3-implemented>.
